NON_NEGOTIABLE_PRINCIPLE.statement: The signal proves truth. The instrument exploits truth. Never reverse.
NON_NEGOTIABLE_PRINCIPLE.implication: Options selection NEVER influences signal thresholds

1_directional_intent.requirement: Options structure must express DOWN without ambiguity

2_time_horizon.requirement: Options expiry must accommodate these horizons without theta decay destroying edge

3_event_sparsity.requirement: Each signal activation must have meaningful payoff potential

4_shadow_observability.requirement: Must be able to observe theoretical payoff without execution

LEDGER_INTEGRITY_CONSTRAINTS.rationale: Direction-Only ROI is the ONLY admissible proof of alpha. Options are downstream.

COMPATIBILITY_TEST.question: Can this options structure express the signal without breaking the above?
COMPATIBILITY_TEST.if_no: Structure is unsuitable, regardless of theoretical payoff
